Name: Hoiwa Hub
About the game: Made in Hong Kong. Background: Hoiwa Hub is a short horror game that take place in an industrial building. Your workshop is at the end of the hallway. Neighbors are still moving in. But one day, something happened to next door. Then it starts affecting my daily routine. So, I have to deal with ghost events every day. Features: Hoiwa Hub is a short game. Game play is around 30mins long. > This game contains ghost / blood / killing / cult content. > No post-processing filter / No head bobbing in game. You can enjoy the realistic graphics without motion sickness. > Wide FOV for comfortably gameplay. > Minimal text and no documents to read during gameplay. Enjoy looking around. Gameplay: - 1st person POV walking simulator - Puzzle solving as usual - Story with several chapters - Small quantity of jump scare - Gore and blood content - Linear gameplay Settings: - Supports Full Screen / Windows Mode - Adjustable Screen Percentage - No save feature. You can access different chapters freely from main menu By Unreal Engine 5.0.3
